text: The Cat Returns is a 2002 Japanese fantasy adventure movie. It was directed by Hiroyuki Morita and produced by Studio Ghibli. == References == Category:2002 adventure movies Category:2002 drama movies Category:2002 fantasy movies Category:2000s manga Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Japanese adventure movies Category:Japanese drama movies Category:Japanese fantasy movies Category:Japanese-language movies Category:Manga series Category:Movies about cats Category:Movies based on comics Category:Studio Ghibli
title: The Cat Returns
